after purchasing Grace of Stars to Cost.

not be converted into Cost.

original:

戦闘を進行しますか？
<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
translation:
編成人格の現平均レベルが、推奨レベルより<color=#990000>低いです。</color>

<CMT_KR>
<CMT_JP>
context:
KR:

전투를 진행하시겠습니까?
EN:
The current average level of Identities in your loadout is <color=#990000>lower</color> than the recommended level.
Proceed anyway?
